column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The experience for me turned downhill when we paid our bill. The waiter brought us the bill and I left my credit card on the table for him to pick up. But when he came back with the swiped card and receipt for signature
column2: he put it in front of my friend who is white although it was me
column4: who put in the credit card. In diversity training
column5: we call this kind of action a manifestation of "micro-aggression
column6: i.e. actions which subtly and sub-consciously diminished the value of minorities. I was extremely disappointed. I would encourage the manager to better train its staff on how to serve its customers.
